name: Hotline Score Counter
description:
If unchecked, the Hotline 024 Score Counter is disabled
(This action may improve performance).

name: Hotline Pause Menu
description:
if unchecked, the Hotline 024 Pause Menu is disabled
(If you have performance problems in the pause menu, you can activate the 'Low Quality' option).

name: Set Pause Music:
description: Select the different tracks from Hotline 024 or those available in the Psych Client Preferences.
